name: Cart Surfer: Arcade
description:
Cart Surfer ported from Club Penguin to Arcade. I decided to make this due to the fact that Club Penguin is shutting down on March 29, 2017, nooooooo!

Controls (which are positioned based on the above pictures):

W - stand on cart

A and D - turn

S - down

G - jump

J - instructions

L - play
